text.section: This section does not apply to a woman who objects to a standard serological syphilis test because the test is against the religious beliefs and practices of the woman.

section.section:
The individual attending a woman for pregnancy shall submit to a medical laboratory:
A blood sample taken from the woman at the time that the individual first examines the woman; and
A blood sample taken from the woman during the third trimester of the pregnancy.
The medical laboratory to which a blood sample is submitted shall do a standard serological syphilis test that is approved by the Department.
